About Me:

Hello, my name is Michael Truell. I am a high school student at Horace Mann in New York City and an intern at Two Sigma, a quantative hedge fund, where I am building an AI challenge.

In my spare time, I create robots, program websites, and tinker with deep neural networks (see projects). I love to run and do so competitvely, in addition to co-heading my schoolâ€™s American Computer Science League team, programming club, and FRC team.
